metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1590 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The kamcmd administrative utility and default configuration in kamailio before 4.3.0 use /tmp/kamailio_ctl.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1590` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

kamailio - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-autheph-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-berkeley-bin - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-berkeley-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-carrierroute-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-cnxcc-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-cpl-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-erlang-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-extra-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-geoip-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-geoip2-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-ims-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-json-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-kazoo-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-ldap-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-lua-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-memcached-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-mongodb-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-mono-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-mysql-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-outbound-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-perl-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-phonenum-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-postgres-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-presence-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-python-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-rabbitmq-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-radius-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-redis-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-sctp-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-snmpstats-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-sqlite-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1
kamailio-systemd-modules - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1

No subscription required

criterions.comment: kamailio package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.0-2ubuntu1').
